A logo maker is a graphic design app to create a logo by yourself using professional logo templates designed by experts.

Who should use the logo maker and how it can help you?
You’re the ideal candidate for a logo maker if you:
- If you don’t have a huge budget
- If you don’t have strong design skills
- If you don’t have a lot of time
- If you need a temporary logo, perhaps for a one-off product or a business you’re not sure about
- If you need help with ideation. The logo you create with a logo maker doesn’t necessarily have to be the one you end up using. You can create a simple logo that illustrates your basic design plan, then show that to a professional designer so they have an idea of what you need.
